amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 2953 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 16) rendered moot in Senate.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2953 rendered moot in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 2953 was not invoked (Roll Call Vote No. 16) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 2953 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 16.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2953 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 2953 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S225) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 2953 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 16.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2953 proposed by Senator Murkowski.
